definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: True, the peasants are in a sense " unruly" in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 的确的，农民在乡里颇有一点子“乱来”。

sentences.english: This protects us from being severely hurt by uncontrolled sexual activity.
sentences.chinese: 这就是要保护我们避免受乱来性行为的严重伤害。

sentences.english: Freeze, don't make him to lose too much blood.
sentences.chinese: 别乱来，不要让他失血太多。

sentences.english: There's no king, the queen does fuck all and the blacks never follow the rules.
sentences.chinese: 没有王，女王啥事儿也不干，然后黑子不守规矩乱来。

sentences.english: While wars could be won or lost, no ruling class could be completely irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 战争虽有胜负，但任何统治阶级都不能完全乱来。

sentences.english: Freeze: don't make him to lose too much hold.
sentences.chinese: 别乱来，不要让他失血太多。

sentences.english: The things I interest in are more than I can handle, time forbids me doing these.
sentences.chinese: 我想做的嘢太多，但喺时间却不容许我乱来。

definition: to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
to act willfully and make a scene/to make trouble
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
to mess around/to mess with something/to have an affair
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
to disturb/to look for trouble/to stir up a row/to bother sb intentionally
see 恣意妄為|恣意妄为[zi4 yi4 wang4 wei2]
to go wrong/to get into trouble
